snippet.title: Bloodhunt - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Join the Bloodhunt and become the ultimate vampire!
Bloodhunt is a free battle royale game set in the Vampire: The Masquerade universe.
A treacherous betrayal has stirred a war amongst the vampires, who are also being targeted for annihilation by a secret society known as the Entity. Use your supernatural powers, weapons and wit in this thrilling battle royale game to dominate the night and restore the Masquerade.

Developed and published by Sharkmob from Malmö, Sweden.

Coming to PC in 2021.

To sign up for a chance to play in our upcoming Closed Alpha and learn more about the game, visit www.bloodhunt.com
Wishlist Bloodhunt on our Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/760160
Subscribe to our YouTube channel to stay up to date with the latest on Bloodhunt, and follow us on our other social media channels:
Website: https://Bloodhunt.com  
Twitter: https://Twitter.com/Bloodhunt 
Discord: https://Discord.gg/Bloodhunt 
Facebook: https://Facebook.com/Bloodhuntgame
Twitch: https://Twitch.tv/Bloodhuntgame
Linktr.ee: https://Linktr.ee/Bloodhunt

© Sharkmob 2021. All Rights Reserved. Vampire: The Masquerade® © Paradox Interactive AB
 
Music: ‘’Feel Nothing’’
Artist: HEALTH
Label: Concord
